name: Roman Prokofyev
description-short: Roman invests in to projects with proven business-model at Early Stage and Stage A

name: Leon Podobedov
description-short: Leon invests in technology innovators at seed and early stage
description-full: Leon supporting game-changing projects in Ukraine. He was a co-founder and CTO of few IT/internet companies, including Easy Systems (CRM/ERP software development, unified communications), MediaContext AdNetwork (sold to HTTPool international AdNetwork) and several global high-load projects with up to 1M users/day (cloud storage, CDN, file-sharing).

name: Bill Gates
description-short: Bill is an American business magnate, entrepreneur, philanthropist, investor, and programmer
description-full: Starting in 1987, Gates was included in the Forbes list of the world’s wealthiest people and was the wealthiest from 1995 to 2007, again in 2009, and has been since 2014. Between 2009 and 2014, his wealth doubled from US$40 billion to more than US$82 billion. Between 2013 and 2014, his wealth increased by US$15 billion. Gates is currently the wealthiest person in the world with a net worth of US$76.4 billion.
